name: CLSActivity
desc: A representation of user interaction with a context.

items.name: func start()
items.desc: Tells an activity to start recording duration and progress for a task.

items.name: func stop()
items.desc: Tells an activity to stop or pause recording duration and progress for a task.

items.name: var isStarted: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean that indicates whether an activity is running.

items.name: var duration: TimeInterval
items.desc: The cumulative time in seconds that an activity has been active.

items.name: var progress: Double
items.desc: A measure of progress through the task, given as a fraction in the range [0, 1].

items.name: func addProgressRange(fromStart: Double, toEnd: Double)
items.desc: Adds a progress range to a given activity.

items.name: func addAdditionalActivityItem(CLSActivityItem)
items.desc: Adds an activity item to an activity.

items.name: var primaryActivityItem: CLSActivityItem?
items.desc: Adds an activity item to an activity and sets it as the primary activity item.

items.name: var additionalActivityItems: [CLSActivityItem]
items.desc: The list of activity items associated with an activity.

items.name: func removeAllActivityItems()
items.desc: Deletes all activity items associated with the current activity.
